startup.description: Start the MCP server using this CLI command. Cannot be started via HTTP.

tools.name: shutdown_server
tools.description: Gracefully shut down the MCP server process. Should only be called when all clients are finished.

tools.name: start_browser
tools.description: Start the Selenium browser session (if not already running).

tools.name: stop_browser
tools.description: Stop the Selenium browser session (not the server).

tools.name: restart_browser
tools.description: Restart the Selenium browser session (not the server).

tools.name: fetch_url
tools.description: Fetch content from a URL using a real browser.

tools.name: find_elements
tools.description: Find and extract information from elements on a web page.

tools.name: click_element
tools.description: Click an element on a web page using CSS selector or XPath.

tools.name: run_js_interaction
tools.description: Execute custom JavaScript code in the browser context.

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Perform general web searches using Google (default) or Bing (if specified).

tools.name: paper_search
tools.description: Perform literature searches using academic engines (Google Scholar, PubMed, IEEE, arXiv, medRxiv, bioRxiv).

tools.name: convert_to_markdown
tools.description: Convert PDF or HTML content to markdown format.

tools.name: convert_file_to_markdown
tools.description: Convert a local HTML or PDF file to markdown and write to output.

tools.name: download_pdfs
tools.description: Download PDF files from web pages using multiple strategies.

tools.name: save_file
tools.description: Save raw content to a file at the specified path.

tools.name: fetch_and_save_url
tools.description: Fetch content from a URL and save it directly to a file.

sse.description: Subscribe to server-sent events for real-time updates.
